pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LiteIndexfast, thread and process safe, easily queryable Indexes for Python.# DefinedIndex**Initialize the DefinedIndex.**- if `db_path` defaults to in-memory.```pythonfrom liteindex import DefinedIndex# Define the schema for the indexschema = { "name": "", "age": 0, "password": "", "verified": False}# Create a DefinedIndex instanceindex = DefinedIndex(name="people", schema=schema, db_path="./test.liteindex")```**Set, Delete**```python# set can be partial or full, can be an existing key or new key.index.set("alice", { "name": "Alicee", "password": "xxxjjssjsjsjsksk", "age": 30})# Set value for a sub keyindex.set(("alice", "name"), "Alice")# Same asindex.set("alice", {"name": "Alice"})# Get value of a keyindex.get("alice")# Get value of a sub keyindex.get("alice", "name")# Delete```
